documents.document:
“What little peace and order the five kings left us will not long survive the three queens, I fear.”
-Petyr Baelish http://t.co/eKm8Xr2Dq0

“He pointed to the spear, then to my mother’s tears, and I picked up the spear.”
-Obara Sand #asoiaf http://t.co/mgY6oOR5vS
The best of them overcame flaws, did their duty. The worst… The worst were those who played the Game of Thrones. http://t.co/8RLndzZGrk
“I can show you... In our joining there is power. Power to make life. Power to make light. Power to cast shadows.” http://t.co/21pwTqtlFf

“Remember that, Sansa, when you come to play the game.”
“What...what game?”
“The only game. The Game of Thrones.” http://t.co/Md4FwowPZc

“No one saw the Mountain die, and no one saw his head removed. That troubles me, I confess…”
-Nymeria Sand #asoiaf http://t.co/oIPfMl0l7S

“You’re mine, Hugor.”
“And what do you mean to do with me?”
“Deliver you,”the knight said, “to the queen.”
#asoiaf http://t.co/Q9Tmw3XU2P

“We hold to the belief that the man who passes the sentence should swing the sword.”
-Eddard Stark #tbt #asoiaf http://t.co/FiJxw3a8cv

“Lord Bolton, he used to say a naked man has few secrets, but a flayed man’s got none.”
-Ramsay as “Reek” #asoiaf http://t.co/wy3RoQNzTq

“He says it is good luck to rub the head of a dwarf.”
“Tell him it is even better luck to suck on a dwarf’s cock.” http://t.co/eW0y4PhI4B

Needle was Robb & Bran & Rickon, her mother & her father, even Sansa… Needle was Jon Snow’s smile.
-Arya #asoiaf http://t.co/57fIAyyYJJ

“Edd, fetch me a block.”
-Jon Snow #asoiaf http://t.co/2UYEcFm4WO

“I need to sleep, but fear to dream.”
-Cersei Lannister #ASongOfIceAndFire #AFeastForCrows http://t.co/HaMxqZ1Rtk

“I found one account of the Long Night that spoke of the last hero slaying Others with a blade of dragonsteel.”
-Sam http://t.co/7DaGMfMfk1
“He was the blood of the dragon, but now his fire has gone out. He was Aemon Targaryen. And now his watch is ended.” http://t.co/2xgZXSj78X

“Fool’s blood, king’s blood, blood on the maiden’s thigh, but chains for the guests & chains for the bridegroom, aye aye aye.”
-Patchface

I will teach them what it means to put a lion in a cage.
-Cersei Lannister #asoiaf #TheGift http://t.co/BcEjPbXMou

Jon smiled a strange, sad smile. “And pull your hood up. The snowflakes are melting in your hair.”
Sam POV #AFFC http://t.co/iYKCtGP6B6

“Will you make me call my gaolers & have you dragged away, you vile, scheming, evil bitch?”
-Margaery Tyrell #asoiaf http://t.co/6uP6e15dfi
“We can’t,” but Gilly said, “We can,” & suddenly his cock was out, jutting up from his breeches like a fat pink mast. http://t.co/P9NOWZM7SC

“Egg?” he said, as the rain streamed down his cheeks. “Egg, I dreamed that I was old.”
-Aemon Targaryen #asoiaf http://t.co/ccZGFsPyu2

Lady Dustin parted her lips in a thin, feral smile. “The north remembers, Frey.”
-Barbrey Dustin #HappyMemorialDay http://t.co/smNqls6R26
Stannis rose to his feet. “I am not Robert. But we will march, and we will free Winterfell … or die in the attempt.” http://t.co/8pessEzzz4

“Until the Mountain crushed my brother’s skull, no Dornishmen had died in this War of the Five Kings. Is that my shame or my glory?”
-Doran

“We need to take a lesson from the Young Wolf, who won every battle… and lost all.”
-Asha Greyjoy #asoiaf #YoungWolf http://t.co/Tp7JaLiiF1

“Swear me your sword, & I’ll drown you in gold.”
“I saw a man drowned in gold once. It was not a pretty sight.” http://t.co/PsFOHSs1bi

“When I’m king in my own right, I’m going to outlaw beets.”
-Tommen Baratheon #asoiaf http://t.co/yTwtspvZsi

“My sisters & I shall not wait ten-and-seven years for our vengeance.”
-Nymeria Sand #ThatSceneSuuucked #books>show http://t.co/ZT51qqbucT

“You are too proud to serve. A servant must be humble & obedient.”
“I obey. I can be humbler than anyone.”
#asoiaf http://t.co/nBfiJNz7qC
In case you hadn't seen George’s opinion on last night’s episode... #UnbowedUnbentUnbroken #couldnotagreemore https://t.co/Q899rHoYTH

“If she’s not wet by the time I’m done disrobing, I will cut off that tongue of yours & nail it to the wall.”
Ramsay http://t.co/mj9hGKFL7y

“You are not wrong. I do not know. And if the gods are good, I never will.”
“The gods are seldom good, Jon Snow.” http://t.co/V24J7l0EKB

“The traveler must beware of broken men, and fear them… but he should pity them as well.”
-Septon Meribald #asoiaf http://t.co/C3LFVT6xPk

“There are ghosts everywhere,” he said softly. “We carry them with us wherever we go.”
-Jorah Mormont #RIPSeason5 http://t.co/dNgKi0Mr2I

“You are quick, for a dancing master,” said Ser Meryn.
“You are slow, for a knight,” Syrio replied.
#asoiaf http://t.co/7c9eHK0SF6
“Stannis is pure iron, black and hard and strong, but brittle, the way iron gets. He’ll break before he bends.” http://t.co/MqXnWhW0Dr

-Maggy the Frog #asoiaf http://t.co/Mke4bWb5eo

The flames crackled softly & whispered the name Jon Snow. Now he was a man, now a wolf, now a man again.
-Melisandre http://t.co/5j5V6hvSb4
I am Cersei of House Lannister, a lion of the Rock, the rightful queen of these Seven Kingdoms… And hair grows back. http://t.co/nJFnPceY8I
Jon fell to his knees… “Ghost,” he whispered. Pain washed over him. He never felt the fourth knife. Only the cold … http://t.co/R0fACnlgVa

Come at once. Help me. Save me. I need you now as I have never needed you before. I love you. I love you. I love you. Come at once.
-Cersei
“The Others smelled the hot blood, & came silent on his trail, stalking him with pale white spiders big as hounds.” http://t.co/Ro1O01Kzsk
Black blood was flowing, smoking where it dripped onto the sand. He is fire made flesh, she thought, and so am I. http://t.co/jGAhndlBnR

“It is an easy thing for a prince to call the spears, but in the end the children pay the price.”
-Doran #asoiaf http://t.co/48EOYrUuo5

Many called her beautiful. She was not beautiful. She was red, and terrible, and red.
-Maester Cressen #asoiaf http://t.co/5HJ5gQkxIW

“We must give [R’hllor] an unbeliever.”
“Half my army is made of unbelievers. I will have no burnings. Pray harder.” http://t.co/yMeojV1iXO

Drogon’s wide black wings beat the air… Yes, she thought, yes, now, now, do it, do it, take me, take me, FLY!
-Dany http://t.co/TSe39NOJN1

“When dead men come hunting in the night, do you think it matters who sits the Iron Throne?”
-Jeor Mormont #asoiaf http://t.co/hXSzk5Qh4t
“Lord Crow is welcome to steal into my bed any night. Once gelded, keeping those vows will come much easier for him.” http://t.co/6kp0QZv1Vk

Dead things in the wood. Dead things in the water… Night falls, he thought, and now my war begins.
-Jon Snow #asoiaf http://t.co/hVefrPXyZZ

“Cersei is as gentle as King Maegor, as selfless as Aegon the Unworthy, as wise as Mad Aerys.”
-Tyrion #fAegon http://t.co/atvgjO1Vvr
“I could keep you safe,” he rasped. “They’re all afraid of me. No one would hurt you again, or I’d kill them.” http://t.co/4S0pPQu1EA

"Aye. I...I liked it some. No one taught you such?"
"There's been no one," he confessed. "Only you."
-Ygritte & Jon http://t.co/5Ld9O0F3MU

Pretty boys had ever been her weakness, particularly the ones who were dark and dangerous as well.
-Arianne #TWOW http://t.co/JEtJ8KEfGT

“So many vows … they make you swear & swear. No matter what you do, you’re forsaking one vow or the other.”
-Jaime http://t.co/YrbzWFtQLm

“The more we bleed each other, the weaker we shall all be when the real enemy falls upon us.”
-Stannis #asoiaf http://t.co/CD4BwjWMeL

“When you find yourself in bed with an ugly woman, the best thing to do is close your eyes & get on with it”
-Petyr http://t.co/GTm1WFD4Le

“Henceforth [the North is] no part of their realm, but a free & independent kingdom, as of old.”
#IndependenceDay http://t.co/rnkOfnItBK

“My old grandmother always used to say, Summer friends will melt away like summer snows, but winter friends are friends forever.”
#asoiaf
“Come no farther.” The Other slid forward on silent feet. Ser Waymar met him bravely. “Dance with me then.” #prologue http://t.co/pXf6T4INjH
The iron captain had no time to wait for laggards. “The most beautiful woman in the world has urgent need of my axe.” http://t.co/XyoXyz9gny
Live,he told himself harshly, live for Cersei, live for Tyrion.Live for vengeance. A Lannister always pays his debts. http://t.co/sQkP9e6Nzy

He looked up & his eyes met Dany’s, “There must be one more. The dragon has three heads.”
-Rhaegar Targaryen #asoiaf http://t.co/hnXfl9v8hu

“There must always be a Stark in Winterfell.”
-Eddard Stark #asoiaf #booksigil #showsigil http://t.co/E35WjiSiQP

“We are only human, & the gods have fashioned us for love. That is our great glory, & our great tragedy.”
#LoveWins http://t.co/bjSvT3r1rY

If I look back I am lost.
-Daenerys Targaryen #asoiaf http://t.co/UeWVMTxND8

“And now it begins,” said Ser Arthur Dayne, the Sword of the Morning.
“No,” Ned said with sadness. “Now it ends.” http://t.co/bqPGgnPQlN

A voice inside her head whispered, there are no heroes.
[4bookslater]
"Edd, fetch me a block."
Sansa & Jon #asoiaf http://t.co/i3uumNr0uC

“I want to portray struggle. Drama comes out of conflict. If you portray a utopia, then you probably wrote a pretty boring book.”
-GRRM

“I want to go home.”
“You should have learned by now, none of us get the things we want.”
-Sansa & Cersei #asoiaf http://t.co/PihCzj12Xw
“I will not tell you stay or go. You must make that choice yourself,& live with it the rest of your days. As I have…” http://t.co/IoyxMnhTvr

“Men may be fond of maidens, but women like a man who knows the bedchamber. It’s another sort of swordplay.”
-Gerris http://t.co/BDVeKjUiKX

“And the mystery knight should win the tourney, and name the wolf maid the queen of love and beauty.”
“She was, but that’s a sadder story.”

“I’m sorry that I never trusted you. I don’t know how to do that anymore.”
-Brienne of Tarth #asoiaf http://t.co/e8U57aKVyI

“This is going to end badly.”
“You say that of everything.”
“Aye, m’lord. Usually I’m right.”
-Dolorous Edd & Jon http://t.co/9qChdOuTGT

The strained silence went on until it was more than Jaime could endure. “Father…” he began.
“You are not my son.” http://t.co/9WkwmBwl0p

A man might befriend a wolf, even break a wolf, but no man could truly tame a wolf.
-Varamyr Sixskins #asoiaf http://t.co/3VNW5Bh6hs

“Viserys says he could sweep the Seven Kingdoms with 10,000 Dothraki screamers.”
“Viserys could not sweep a stable with 10,000 brooms.”

-Jaime Lannister #asoiaf http://t.co/rNwOCcVd02

“The stallion who mounts the world has no need of iron chairs.”
-Khal Drogo #asoiaf #Rhaego http://t.co/qeqU5YNx5e

The northmen poured in howling. Wolves, she thought, they howl like bloody wolves. The war cry of the north.
Asha http://t.co/gQNEcisVUs

“And when I die, bury with me a crossbow, so I can thank the Father Above the same way I thanked the father below.” http://t.co/6TGImHR7EF

"You are not the only turncloak here, it would seem. Would that all the lords in the Seven Kingdoms had but a single neck."
-Stannis #TWOW

“We are the ironborn, and once we were conquerors… I say we take it all! I say, we take Westeros.”
-Euron Greyjoy http://t.co/eMcL7QVGoT

“An oak may live 300 years, a redwood tree 3000. A weirwood will live forever if left undisturbed.”
-Brynden Rivers http://t.co/pTyMjMXo7O
I have to find her…I promised Jaime. Oathkeeper, he named the sword. I have to try to save her…or die in the attempt. http://t.co/Y0xLObSTpS

“I was trying to win the throne to save the kingdom, when I should have been trying to save the kingdom to win the throne.”
-Stannis

Promise me, she had cried, in a room that smelled of blood and roses. Promise me, Ned.
-Lyanna #TowerOfJoyCONFIRMED http://t.co/j9pgjpHvMt
Strong as a bear. Fierce as a wolverine. Fear cuts deeper than swords. The man who fears losing has already lost. http://t.co/ypiwGmcGS9
“A golden sword, don’t you know. Until his blood ran red down the blade. Those are the Lannister colors, red & gold.” http://t.co/8vnI3eyaWV
